scripts.dev-offline: cross-env RUST_BACKTRACE=1 RUST_LIB_BACKTRACE=1 BUILD_MODE=offline EMBEDDED_VERSION=1.14.4.0 tauri dev --exit-on-panic --features offline
scripts.build: cross-env STATIC_VCRUNTIME=false tauri build -- -Z build-std=std,panic_abort -Z build-std-features="optimize_for_size"
scripts.build-online: cross-env STATIC_VCRUNTIME=false tauri build -- -Z build-std=std,panic_abort -Z build-std-features="optimize_for_size"
scripts.build-offline: cross-env STATIC_VCRUNTIME=false tauri build --features offline -- -Z build-std=std,panic_abort -Z build-std-features="optimize_for_size"
